body.name: FOCHIER F 3 piece Hard Shell Luggage Sets Suitcase Set, PC+ABS Lightweight Hardside Travel Suitcase with Spinner Wheels & TSA Lock for Women Men (20/24/28 inch)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 45 mins
features: 【Anti-cracking Hard Shell】With a shell made of polycarbonate composite,the suitcases are designed to absorb impact, it will flex and bend under stress then pop back to the original shape, so no worry about your luggage shell crack when it is tossed around by baggage agents, exterior surface features a stylish diamond-embossed texture, which deters the appearance of scratches and scuffs

【Safer TSA Locks】With built-in TSA combination locks on each size, they are a must-have for checked luggage on both domestic and international flights to and from the U.S. It can be easily opened by airport customs authorities when necessary for inspection via using a master key. Without these, agents may have to force locks or break zippers to gain access

【Retractable handle&Spinner wheels】Lightweight aluminum push-button telescopic trolley handle system with multi-stage locking heights can be pulled up to suit your height.The double spinner wheels allow it to roll in all directions, which are perfect for helping you move quickly and smoothly through the airport and then on to your destination

【3 Piece Hard Suitcase Set】The set includes 3 sizes, carry-on size and weight allowances vary by airlines, another 2 piece are need to be checked into the hold when you fly.3 different sizes can meet your travel needs at different times or planned family trips.The smaller cases can fit inside the larger one for storage when not in use, just like a Russian stacking doll
【Manufacturer's 2-year Warranty】You can enjoy our FOCHIER 2-year warranty for this product, please contact us ASAP to activate your warranty after receiving your products

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Sturdy Telescoping Handle Thickened aluminum telescoping handle allows a weight of at least 150 pounds Scratch-Resistant Rexture Micro-diamond texture is extremely scratch-resistant,keeping suitcase set beautiful after a travel Next page 1 Built in TSA Lock 2 TPU Elastic Handle 3 Internal Structure 4 3-Step Telescoping Handle 5 PC+ABS Anti-Scratch

Family Travel Luggage Sets The luggage sets 3 piece is suitable for family travel. Couple Travel Suitcase Sets You can enjoy a wonderful journey with your partner using our trolley case. Back to School Suitcase If you need to go back to school, our 3 pieces luggage sets are a great choice for packing your clothings. Business Travel Luggage Our luggage is also very suitable for use during your business trip

Do I need to return all 3 piece if one suitcase is defective? We will send you a replacement, contact our service team for help! How durable is the suitcase set with PC+ABS material? Fochier 3 piece luggage made from extra strong PC+ABS material, which is lightweight and extremely durable than ABS material only. Features textured finish to prevent against scratches,keeping lightweight luggage set beautiful trip after trip. How many packages will I receive?How are these suitcases packaged? One set will be packed in one box,20"/24"/ 28"suitcases can be nested within each other.Small suitcase into the medium suticase into the large suitcase. Can the lock be opened by TSA? Yes,TSA-approved locks come already built-in, allowing these cases to offer an additional layer of security for your belongings. Are these okay for international travel? Do they meet the size requirements for carry on and checked luggage? The 20 inch carry-on luggage usually meets most airlines standard. The 24 iinch 28 inch can be used as a check-in. We suggest you contact the airline company directly to know their specific policies regarding this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Durable, and Perfect for travel!
reviews.reviewText: I was in need of new luggage and I read a million reviews of different kinds of luggage before making a purchase. I needed a new TSA/airline approved carry on, as mine always toppled over, but I was finding that most that I was finding were saying "carry on" but weren't including the measurement of the wheels and handles so they were too big and I couldn't carry them on (which kinda defeats the point of a carry on, right?). I looked at this set for over a week before committing to them and I am so glad that I did. I spent $100 on a Sampsonite "carry on" that ended up being too big and I got this whole set for just a little more. Now I have a full set of luggage with multiple size options for different trips. I have only used the little one, but it held up very will in travel and it has very smooth rolling wheels. I seamlessly rolled it through the airport to get to all of my connecting flights. On the way home, I even had to check it (Id bought a bottle of wine) so I was able to expand it and check it and it held up very well and took whatever beating checked luggage goes through in airports like a champ! It only had a few scuffs on it when I got it back. I feel obligated to also note that the blue color itself is colorful and fun and easy to spot on the conveyor belt (most people have gray/blue/navy/dark luggage, and I LOVE the color of this set!At first, I wan't sure how I felt about the half and half packing, but I use packing cubes, and they worked perfectly, and I honestly may like it better, because I felt so much more organized on this trip. I am also very limited on storage space at home, as I rent an efficiency suite, so I love that they all fit into each other. It really minimizes the footprint. I highly recommend it this set!Seriously. the only thing I would change about this set is the zipper lock. They are not TSA approved, so you will need a separate TSA lock if you are flying. They are great for extra privacy on road trips though, so if you are not flying with these, that is a non issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We were very pleased with how well they roll
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set for my daughter and I to use on our trip to New York. We were very pleased with how well they roll, making it easy to maneuver through two busy airports and the hotel. They held up very well, and they are well within the size limits required by the airlines. (we flew Southwest)They are a great value for the price. My only complaint is that when I looked at the closeup pictures, it shows the blue luggage with TSA locks. I ordered the blue luggage, but then discovered the TSA locks only come on the green set, so I had to purchase locks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and great price
reviews.reviewText: Great product and great price. Shipping was fast and the customer service was great and very timely. I had a question about the product and they answered it immediately. I'm very happy with the suitcases. The suitcases are very light and very strong, perfect for travels these days. The locking mechanism was easy to set and is very secure. All three bags are very roomy and allow for expanding which is great. Already used the set on our trip abroad and the set held up quite well. The wheels are super smooth too. I highly recommend this set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars review on luggage
reviews.reviewText: Seems like decent luggage. The only problem I have is that the zipper from the inside lining separated just checking it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great set for good price.
reviews.reviewText: Light Weight, great colors, smooth pushing or pulling motion. This is good for standard use. The lock is standard and works well, just make sure you read the instructions on how to set and reset before attempting to lock. If you lose instructions, you can find it on youtube. I like the compartments and sections that you will normally find in all standard luggage. The zippers are sturdy and big zipper handles that make it easy to access and slide across without getting caught. Nice set for good price and would recommend. Ironically I thought that this color would stand out. Laughing when another guy on the flight had same color bags.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Super cute, color is true to the picture. They seem to be great quality and sturdy enough. I haven't had a chance to give them a real go at the airport just yet, but overall they seem to be fabulous quality for the price point. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth every penny!
reviews.reviewText: I received my luggage yesterday and I must say that I love it. It’s extremely durable and is the exact color as pictured. Is has multiple compartments and is very spacious. Definitely would recommend buying this set if you are looking to buy new luggage ❤️❤️❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The wheels make it very easy to move around
reviews.reviewText: This luggage just came back from being bounced around on an airplane, then a cruise ship. It stood up extremely well. The wheels make it very easy to move around. The carry on also carried about a 20# bag on top while rolling through the airports.
